actions.desc: The lesser scrag makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4)
actions.name: Bite

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4)
actions.name: Claws

special_abilities.desc: The scrag can breathe air and water
special_abilities.name: Amphibious

special_abilities.desc: The lesser scrag regains 5 hp at the start of its turn if it is in contact with water. If the scrag takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn’t function at the start of the scrag’s next turn. The scrag dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hp and doesn’t regenerate.
special_abilities.name: Regeneration
